dict.acceptation: 唯一的；仅有的；最好的，最适当的；

sent.orig: In positive statements it is used generally with only, much and a lot.
sent.trans: 若用于肯定式陈述句中，通常与only,much和alot连用。

sent.orig: Based on Bulk-Only specification, MCU firmware is designed, which is used to control bulk data transfer.
sent.trans: 为测试需要，参考Bulk-Only协议编写了部分微处理器程序固件，用于批量数据交换控制。

sent.orig: When used as an adverb, only should be placed with care to avoid ambiguity.
sent.trans: 当only用作副词时应注意避免意义模糊。

sent.orig: In SNA, deprecated term for only-in-chain (OIC).
sent.trans: 在系统网络体系结构(SNA)中，建议使用only-in-chain(OIC)。

sent.orig: Generally this means having only adjoin the word or words that it limits.
sent.trans: 一般来说，这意味着把only放在被限定词的旁边。
